Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceancrest Avenue at the main entrance of the Ashton Falls Resort.
Room.LongDescription: Further to the east you can see the intersection of Oceancrest Avenue and Riverdell Way. Immediately to the north is a wide marbled stairway which leads to a guarded entrance to the most expensive place to live in all of the city. On the south side of the avenue is a small park with large shade trees and well kept lawns.
